messages.text: Welcome to DataMatch! How are you finding the platform so far?
Thank you! I'm really enjoying it. The interface is intuitive and I've already connected with some interesting professionals.
That's great to hear! Have you tried the LinkedIn integration feature?
Not yet, but I plan to try it today. Does it pull in all my professional experience automatically?
Yes, it pulls in your work history, education, and skills. It really helps create better matches based on professional compatibility!
